players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed. We should all share our thoughts to figure out the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm also shocked about Alice. Bob, what are your thoughts so far? Diana, any suspicions?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for him."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a baseless accusation. Why are you trying to divert attention from yourself? Bob, don't let her mislead us."
Diana: "Based on my investigation, Charlie is the mafioso. Bob, we need to vote him out to protect the town."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, your investigation of Charlie is convincing. We should vote for him to save the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed. We should all share our thoughts to figure out the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm also shocked about Alice. Bob, what are your thoughts so far? Diana, any suspicions?"
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for him."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a baseless accusation. Why are you trying to divert attention from yourself? Bob, don't let her mislead us."
You: "Based on my investigation, Charlie is the mafioso. Bob, we need to vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, your investigation of Charlie is convincing. We should vote for him to save the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
